alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clinton; Western Clinton (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 09 at 9:33PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...Heavy snow will impact portions of northern Clinton, northern Lamoille, northern Caledonia, northern Orleans, northern Grand Isle and Franklin Counties through 1000 PM EST... At 931 PM EST, a band of moderate to heavy snow was reported along a line extending from Ellenburg, New York to near Franklin, Vermont, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds 25 mph or greater, and visibility less than a mile. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds may blow around unsecured objects. Low visibility may pose a hazard to motorists. Locations impacted include... Newport City, Plattsburgh, Beekmantown, Chazy, Saranac, Mooers, Altona, Enosburg Falls, Orleans, Derby Center, Franklin, Jay, Newport Town, Champlain, Montgomery Center, Sheldon, Brownington Village, Irasburg, South Alburgh and Alburgh. This includes the following highways... Interstate 89 between mile markers 118 and 129. Interstate 91 between mile markers 158 and 177.
